code: import _objectSpread from"D:/sakshi college/cc miniproject/lib_management/client/node_modules/babel-preset-react-app/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2";import*as ActionTypes from'./ActionTypes';var Books=function Books(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{isLoading:true,errMess:null,books:[]};var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case ActionTypes.ADD_BOOKS:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{isLoading:false,errMess:null,books:action.payload});case ActionTypes.BOOKS_LOADING:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{isLoading:true,errMess:null,books:[]});case ActionTypes.BOOKS_FAILED:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{isLoading:false,errMess:action.payload});case ActionTypes.ADD_BOOK:var book=action.payload;return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{books:state.books.concat(book)});case ActionTypes.EDIT_BOOK:var newbook=action.payload;return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{books:state.books.map(function(book){if(book._id===newbook._id){return newbook;}else{return book;}})});case ActionTypes.DELETE_BOOK:var resp=action.payload;return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{books:state.books.filter(function(book){return book._id!==resp._id;})});default:return state;}};export default Books;
